title: Strengthening Hospitality Practical Competencies: Ethics Competency Intensive Workshop for Medical Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Analyze five types of ethical dilemmas that may arise in actual medical practice and propose solutions
Explain core ethical principles (patient rights, medical resource allocation, doctor-patient relationships) through situational application cases
Enhance critical thinking skills by sharing ethical decision-making processes with peer learners in online discussion forums
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
